title: How long it may take to fully charge E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 and how long E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 can work by using the fully charged battery?
answer:
1. Maximum time to full charge E5336Bs-2&Bs-6 battery

        Device off charged by AC charger: 3h

        Device on charged by AC charger: 3.5h— 4h.

        Device off and charged by USB cable: 4h— 4.5h.

        Device on and charged by USB cable: 4.5h— 5h.


2. Maximum working time:

         Maximum working time: 5–6 hours (depending on the network)

         Maximum standby time: 300 hours (depending on the network)

       Some improper uses will influent the life of battery, for example: used under high/low temperature and humid environment, leaving battery unused for long time, the battery be charged and discharged for too many times

  The environment temperature required by the battery is -20℃-60℃(the ideal value is 35℃)，the relative humidity is 5℃-95℃（the ideal value is 55℃）.
